All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCommentFragment
    This fragment prompt the user to type in the new comment
    AddCommentFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener  
    BrowsePlayerActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to browse players game wide
    BrowseQRActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to browse QR codes game wide
    CameraScannerActivity
    This activity launches the camera to scan qrcode, bind the qrcode scanner and qrcode analyzer to camera, and preview the feed from camera
    CommentAdapter  
    Comments
    This class holds all of the data for a Comment on a QR code
    DeleteCommentFragment
    This fragment prompt the admin if they want to delete the comment
    DeleteCommentFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener  
    EditPlayerProfileActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to see and change their password, nickname and phone number
    EditQRCodeScreenActivity
    This activity allows user to edit the general information about the qrcode such changing name, and adding comments
    FoundPlayerProfileActivity
    This Activity Class is opened when a user vists another players profile (Shows the data of the player who's profile is being visted)
    GeneratedQRCodeActivity
    This Activity Class is opened when a Player needs to generate a QR Code (to login or share their profile)
    MapActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to view QR Codes in a Map
    MyQRCodeScreenActivity
    This Activity Class allows the Player to see their own scanned QR Codes, and contains a button that allows user to scan new qrcode
    Player
    This class holds all of the data for a single Player
    PlayerAdapter  
    PlayerAdapter1
    This Adapter Class is used for listview in the BrowsePlayersScreen (getNumQR())
    PlayerAdapter2
    This Adapter Class is used for listview in the BrowsePlayersScreen (getTotalScore())
    PlayerAdapter3
    This Adapter Class is used for listview in the BrowsePlayersScreen (getHighestScore())
    PlayerNumQRComparator  
    PlayerProfileActivity
    This Activity Class shows the Player profile and the data contained in their account (such as QR Codes and Total Score)
    PlayerSingleScoreComparator  
    PlayerTotalScoreComparator  
    QrAddScreenActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to add QR Codes.
    QrAddScreenAddPhotoFragment
    A fragment that prompt the user to select if they want to add photo via camera or gallery
    QrChangeNameFragment
    This fragment prompts the user to enter a new name for the qrcode
    QrChangeNameFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener  
    QRCode
    This class holds all of the data for a single QR Code
    QRCodeAdapter
    This Adapter Class is used for listview in MyQRCodeScreen and BrowseQRCodesScreen
    QRCodeInfoActivity
    Display the general information of the qrcode such as name, score, location, image, and owners
    QRCodeScoreComparator1
    This class is used for ordering QRCodes based on scores from High to Low
    QRCodeScoreComparator2
    This class is used for ordering QRCodes based on scores from Low to High
    SaveANDLoad
    This class makes it convenient to sava and load data with shared preference
    SelectQRLocationActivity
    This Activity Class allows the user to select the location of a QR code on a map
    WelcomeActivity
    This Activity Class allows a Player to login with a QR Code or with a new Account
